item.description: OK, our last potluck dinner at Olga's was 5-star and we only had 8 people. If you come please bring your favorite mushroom dish and what you will be drinking. Last dinner Bill also brought flowers for our host and Jan brought champaign to toast our first ML dinner and Olga made a dessert that I can still taste. We eat, danced, hoola-hooped and talked shop. Don't miss this dinner...only 15 spots.
item.how_to_find_us: Olga will send directions a day before the dinner to all that respond.
item.why: We might read this book and discuss it over another mushroom dinner. "Mycelium Running: How Mushrooms Can Help Save the World" by Paul Stamets
item.name: Mushroom Potluck Dinner at Olga's
